Text.Name: OrnamentBase
Text.Desc: A decorative structure. It can affect the Five Elements of its surroundings based on its materials.

Text.Name: Building_Flag2
Text.ThingName: ธงสามเหลี่ยม

Text.Name: Building_BigSwordPillar
Text.Desc: Spare artifacts can be used to form a Sword Shield, which can be activated to defend enemies' attack. The Shield can only protect inner disciples. Artifacts cannot be retrieved.

Text.Name: Building_BookShelf
Text.ThingName: ชั้นวางหนังสือ

Text.Name: Building_ItemShelf
Text.ThingName: ชั้นวางของ
Text.Desc: Items can be selected and placed on the Display.

Text.Name: Building_ShuZhuangTai
Text.ThingName: โต๊ะเครื่องแป้ง

Text.Name: Building_Tower
Text.ThingName: เจดีย์สะกด

Text.Name: Building_Zhong
Text.Desc: A large bell that can be rung to alert and summon all the outer disciples so that they will avoid danger, but needs stopping manually. It can also be used as a decoration, which affects the Five Elements of its surroundings based on its materials.

Text.Name: Building_PenZai1
Text.ThingName: บอนไซ (ชอุ่ม)

Text.Name: Building_PenZai3
Text.ThingName: บอนไซ (ตั้งตรง)

Text.Name: Building_ShiBei1
Text.ThingName: แผ่นศิลากำลัง

Text.Name: Building_Zhong1
Text.ThingName: ระฆังมังกร

Text.Name: Building_BookShelf_CangJing
Text.ThingName: ชั้นเก็บตำรา
Text.Desc: Bookshelf used to store secret manuals, each has a storage capacity of 100. The harder the manual, the more storage room it takes.

Text.Name: Building_StoneYiJi1
Text.ThingName: แผ่นศิลาบิกซิน

Text.Name: Building_StoneYiJi2
Text.ThingName: รูปปั้นเสื่อมสภาพ

Text.Name: Building_JuNengDeng
Text.ThingName: แสงดั้งเดิม
